name: BADLAO INSTITUTE OF TRAINING AND MANAGMENT

address: BADLAO INSTITUTE OF TRAINING AND MANAGEMENT

briefDescription: Badlao Institute of Training and Management is an Institution for Management & Leadership for Social Transformation. The Institute acts as a center for learning and Development for social sector organization based at Jharkhand. presently we conduct need based training and skill building program for mid level and grass root functionaries of government, civil society and PRI functionaries. Since inception we have trained more than 500 people in diversified streams of development including PRI, Natural Resource management, Livelihood, Non Farm Vocations, HIV AIDS, and education. Apart from this we hold workshop, Meetings and exposure program for various beneficiaries. we do the documentation, Research, Study & Evaluation.
